content.rendered:
Directed by Boyapati Srinu.

Written by Gopimohan. Rishabh Purohit. M. Rathnam. Boyapati Srinu.

Cast Allu Arjun(Gana). Aadhi(Vairam Dhanush). Rakul Preet Singh(Mahalaksmi). Catherine Tresa(Hansitha Reddy) . Anjali(Sinthamani (Special appearance)). Annapoorna(Arunamma). Joy Badlani(S.T.S Officer). Aadarsh Balakrishna(Veerendra). Brahmanandam(Archeologist). Chalapathi Rao(Naidu). Devadarshini Chetan(Gayatri). Md Asraful Hoque(Antor). V. Jayaprakash(Umapati). Rajeev Kanakala(Defense Lawyer Govindaraju). Raja Krishnamoorthy(Chief Minister Reddy (as Kitty)). Sai Kumar(Jaya Prakash (as Saikumar)). Duvvasi Mohan(Priest). Prabhakar(Dhanush’s henchman). Vinaya Prasad(Lakshmi). Prudhviraj(Obul Reddy’s henchman). Rahul Verma Rajput((as Rahul Verma)). Vidyullekha Raman(Tamizh Selvi). Jayaprakash Reddy(Bhoopathi).Ramana Reddy. Supreeth Reddy(Dhanush’s henchman). Sameer(Lawyer). Pradeep Singh Rawat(Obul). Sravan(Dhanush’s henchman). Meka Srikanth(Sripathi). L.B. Sriram(Ramudu). Suman(Mallikarjun). Surekha Vani(Padma). Vijayakumar(Pedhayya (as Vijay Kumar)).Veera Ravi Kumar Yalla

Language Telugu.

Producers Allu Aravind. Ayan. Shanam Naga Ashok Kumar. Bunny Vasu.

Production Geetha Arts. Goldmines Telefilms.
